data.title: New York Cities by Population (2024)
data.meta_description: Get a list of New York cities by population based on Census 2023 data.
data.text:
The most populated cities in New York are New York city with 8,258,035, Hempstead town at 785,678, Brookhaven with 488,338, Islip at 336,822, and Oyster Bay with 297,782. You can get the most current Census population data for all 1,524 New York cities, sorted from the most populous cities in New York to the least, according to the 2023 Population Estimates Program and 2022 American Community Survey.

Sure, you can copy this list right into your favorite spreadsheet tool. Or save yourself formatting headaches and grab the latest New York cities population data as a ready-to-use Excelâ„¢ file below. It's time to stop searching and start digging into data!
